name: Shields Up!!
description:
Your ship is damaged, adrift in space and moving through a dangerous asteroid field.  Thrusters inoperable, sensors offline, power generation at minimal levels.  Only things that seem to be operational are life support and deflector shields.  With so little power you can only activate one of your deflectors at a time. Quickly switch shield directions to protect your ship from danger!

Controls:

Start:Space/EnterRotate ShieldsWASD/Arrow Keys

Created for the Lowrez Jam 2022.
